timeline.bodyText: What type of messages does this hide?
timeline.author: Juuxel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -243,5 +247,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_310 net/minecraft/client/MinecraftClient
 		ARG 2 monitor
 	METHOD method_27466 initFont (Z)V
 		ARG 1 forcesUnicode
+	METHOD method_29042 shouldHideMessage (Ljava/util/UUID;)Z

replies.bodyText: Chat messages, and check if online chat option is enabled
replies.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText:
maybe isMuted?

  
    
  
    

  
  This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            	METHOD method_29042 shouldHideMessage (Ljava/util/UUID;)Z
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_29042 isMessageBlocked (Ljava/util/UUID;)Z
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText:
The parameter is already sender, so you know if a sender is muted. also this exists for all game messages than just user messages
On another note, this check is used by narrator as well. Checking shouldHide in narrator doesn't make as much sense as checking isMuted
replies.author: liach

timeline.author: liach
